fomod.Name: Devourment Refactor
fomod.Author: MarkDF
fomod.Description: A modernized and heavily refactored version of Devourment -- based on Galmar1313's Devourment Male and Female (DMAF). Incorporates work from BoxxFoxx, Rox, Macross, Gherking, Galmar1313, ForgetfulHatter, Stranger, and many others.
